title: New: Headphone Hair – Seraphim
body:
There’s a real early Shins-esque vibe to the songwriting from Oakland’s **Headphone Hair** aka middle school teacher Ian Walters.

Undoubtedly a slightly saccharine undertone to it yet when listened to within context of his recent Brother / Sister EP, then it starts to make sense. Check out EP highlight Seraphim below, and grab the full EP from [Bandcamp](https://headphonehair.bandcamp.com/releases).
